timeline.title: First Job
timeline.description: Started at PetSmart as an overnight stocker. First work experience - building the foundation.

timeline.title: GNC & Supplement Industry
timeline.description: Joined GNC and learned the supplement industry from the inside. This is where the Serenergy idea was born - saw the market opportunity firsthand.

timeline.title: Serenergy Founded
timeline.description: Quit to go all in on the dream. Launched a nootropic energy shot company at 20. 2oz caffeine + L-theanine shots, 'Serene Energy' branding. Built everything solo: formulation, brand, packaging, sales, supply chain.

timeline.title: Building & Surviving
timeline.description: VitaminShoppe Keyholder by day, founder by night. Worked retail to survive and fund inventory - not as a backup plan, but because CPG is expensive and there was no safety net. Never stopped building.

timeline.title: Television & Traction
timeline.description: Appeared on local TV twice. Sold thousands of units through events and farmers markets. Got to VitaminShoppe NATIONAL BUYER meetings - distribution was within reach. Then Pilotworks shut down.

timeline.title: The Pivot
timeline.description: Pilotworks (WeWork-style commercial kitchen) collapsed, taking hundreds of food startups with it. Lost the means to make the product overnight. Made the hard decision to pivot to IT. Started self-teaching - no bootcamp, no CS degree.

timeline.title: VitaminShoppe IT
timeline.description: Internal promotion from retail Keyholder to IT Service Desk. VitaminShoppe saw something in me. Self-taught the skills, earned the opportunity. Remote position supporting 5,000+ users.

timeline.title: AI Early Adopter
timeline.description: Gained API access to GPT-3.5/ChatGPT playground in August 2022 - THREE MONTHS before the Nov 30, 2022 public launch. Top 0.1% of early users (ChatGPT Wrapped verified). Started building with LLMs immediately.

timeline.title: AWS Certified
timeline.description: Earned AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification. Completed Cloud Resume Challenge. Continued deepening technical expertise across cloud and automation.

timeline.title: System Admin + Aelorians
timeline.description: System Administrator at TransCore. Started building Aelorians AI companion platform. Invested in RTX 5090 for local model fine-tuning. Now building AI systems, not just using AI tools.

timeline.title: What's Next?
timeline.description: Looking for the right opportunity to combine technical depth with customer understanding and builder mentality. AI-focused product roles, developer relations, solutions architecture - wherever I can build things that genuinely help people.
